reviews.title: Energy Drink Alternative.
reviews.comment: Are you an energy drink junkie? You should check out this free app and get the skinny on energy drinks and discover a kinder, gentler alternative that has the desired effect without the side effects of some popular energy drinks.
reviews.author: A Google User
